version_description:
Brand new Ice Cold level pack!
Take on the elements and see just how cool you are!

- Welcome to the Cyber World, 10 new levels for you all to get through.
- Brand new Cyber Bike
- Bug fixes

BRAND NEW LEVELS

- 15 spooky Halloween levels added in the Trick or Treat update, can you beat them all?
- NEW CHARACTER: Pumpkin Head Rider with the Skeleton Bike
- NEW CHARACTER: The Witch

We've fixed a few issues users were having, if you experience any problems please email support@aceviral.com

BRAND NEW LEVEL PACK!!!!!
Welcome to the Christmas zone. Feel festive with these new levels to overcome.
but wait, theres more

We've also added 2 new characters to explore with!
Happy Holidays

BRAND NEW LEVELS

- 15 spooky Halloween levels added in the Trick or Treat update, can you beat them all?
- NEW CHARACTER: Pumpkin Head Rider with the Skeleton Bike
- NEW CHARACTER: The Witch

We've fixed a few issues users were having, if you experience any problems please email support@aceviral.com

BRAND NEW LEVEL PACK!!!!!
Welcome to the Christmas zone. Feel festive with these new levels to overcome.
but wait, theres more

We've also added 2 new characters to explore with!
Happy Holidays

Easter is coming with a we are sending you riders on an Egg Hunt!
- Uncover eggs spread out around Moto X3Ms levels
- Brand New Characters to unlock!

Come and join the Pool Party!
15 Brand new levels for you to test your skills
3 New Bikes to unlock.
- Halloween Map fix
- Halloween Map fix

Tackle brand new levels and unlock the new Elf Biker!
Happy Holidays!

- Fixed a lot of backend issues to make this a much smoother Bike game.
- A few users were having issues with the ground disappearing but we have dealt with that too.

Enjoy Moto X3M!

BRAND NEW LEVELS AND RIDERS!!!!
Welcome to the Construction Yard! With 15 new levels to race through and 2 new riders, the Loader bike and Compacter!

BRAND NEW LEVELS AND RIDERS!!!!
Welcome to the Construction Yard! With 15 new levels to race through and 2 new riders, the Loader bike and Compacter!

Fixed an issue that was causing the app to crash on iOS 9 and 10

BRAND NEW LEVELS AND RIDERS!!!!
Welcome to the Construction Yard! With 15 new levels to race through and 2 new riders, the Loader bike and Compacter!

Fixed an issue that was causing the app to crash on iOS 9 and 10

BRAND NEW LEVELS AND RIDERS!!!!
Welcome to the Construction Yard! With 15 new levels to race through and 2 new riders, the Loader bike and Compacter!
- Fixed an issue where pausing the game would disable the controls
- Timer will now reset to time you passed a checkpoint when returning to it
- Stunt rewards updated to give you the correct reward when completing a double or treble flip
- Fixed an issue that was causing the app to crash on iOS 9 and 10

- New way to unlock new Motorbikes.
- Updated backend code for a smoother bike game.

Welcome X3M riders!
- You can now earn XP for completing levels and unlock all bikes for FREE.
- Improved compression to reduce app size

Welcome X3M riders!
- You can now earn XP for completing levels and unlock all bikes for FREE.
- Improved compression to reduce app size
- Discovered some devices were the background wasn't filling the device screen

Splish, Splash We were taking a bath!
- We've added even more levels into the Pool Party zone.
- 2 New bikes added for your discovery
- Made it easier to access the alternative zones from the Map Screen.
